url.title: GitLab API URL
url.description: GitLab API URL, e.g for GitLab Enterprise: https://my-gitlab-host.com

reject_unauthorized.title: Enable certificate validation
reject_unauthorized.description: Enable certificate validation for the GitLab server

groups.title: Groups list
groups.description: List of GitLab groups from which to fetch data. If none passed, all visible groups for the authenticated user/app will be used.

excluded_groups.title: Excluded Groups list
excluded_groups.description: List of GitLab groups from which data won't be fetched. By default, no groups are excluded.

use_faros_graph_projects_selection.title: Use Faros Graph for Projects selection
use_faros_graph_projects_selection.description: Use Faros Graph for selecting which projects should be fetched (Faros credentials are required).

projects.title: Projects list
projects.description: List of GitLab projects from which to fetch data. If none passed for a group, all visible group projects for the authenticated user will be used.

excluded_projects.title: Excluded Projects list
excluded_projects.description: List of GitLab projects from which data won't be fetched. By default, no projects are excluded for a group. If projects list contains at least one project for a group, projects for the same group on this list will be ignored.

run_mode.title: Run Mode
run_mode.description: Run mode for selecting the usage of the connector

custom_streams.title: Custom Streams
custom_streams.description: List of streams to run when selected Run Mode is Custom (if empty, all available streams will run)

api_key.title: Faros API Key
api_key.description: Faros API Key to use when connecting to the Faros Graph to resolve VCS dependencies

api_url.title: Faros API URL
api_url.description: Faros API URL to use when connecting to the Faros Graph to resolve VCS dependencies

graph.title: Faros Graph
graph.description: The Faros graph to use for fetching projects selection

cutoff_days.title: Cutoff Days
cutoff_days.description: Only fetch data updated after cutoff

bucket_id.title: Bucket Number
bucket_id.description: Bucket number for this source to determine which portion of groups and projects to pull. Use it when distributing the load between multiple sources.

bucket_total.title: Total Number of Buckets
bucket_total.description: Total number of buckets to distribute groups and projects across. Use it when distributing the load between multiple sources

round_robin_bucket_execution.title: Round Robin Bucket Execution
round_robin_bucket_execution.description: When enabled, syncs rotate through all buckets, processing one bucket per sync. When disabled, only the bucket specified by 'bucket_id' is synced.

bucket_ranges.title: Bucket Ranges
bucket_ranges.description: List of bucket ranges to process when round robin bucket execution is enabled. Each element can be either a single bucket number (e.g., '7') or a range of buckets (e.g., '3-5'). All bucket numbers must be between 1 and 'bucket_total'.

page_size.title: Page Size
page_size.description: Maximum number of items in a paginated response

timeout.title: Request Timeout
timeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds for each request to the GitLab API

backfill.title: Backfill
backfill.description: Backfill data from the start date to the end date.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date from which to start syncing data.

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: The date at which to stop syncing data.
